settings.content_1_description: Omega 3 EPA contributes to normal heart health and the maintenance of normal blood pressure.
settings.content_2_description: Vitamin C and the full B complex support normal psychological function—helping keep neurotransmitter production balanced.
settings.content_3_description: Folate (B9), iron, and vitamins A, C, D, B6 and B12 support immune function—maintaining your natural defences.*
settings.content_4_description: Vitamin B12 and iron support energy metabolism and regulate tiredness—so you can sleep longer and deeper.
settings.content_5_description: Zinc and biotin (B7) maintain hair and skin—keeping them healthy and strong.*
settings.content_6_description: Vitamin B5 supports mental performance—so you can concentrate better and feel more clarity.*

settings.heading: Simplicity is our secret ingredient.
settings.subtext: When it comes to our formula, we’re as proud of what we put in as what we left out.
